short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your digital memory for the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Vortex bookmark extension, you always have the perfect overview of your favorite pages and content - simple, efficient and without unnecessary frills. Save links and notes and organize everything in one place, ready to hand at any time.
It's my first extension, so leave me a comment for feedback.

Have fun and buy me a coffee if you like it: https://ko-fi.com/enthasia

Note: synchronization is only possible with a chrome account.
